name: Visitor 来访者
description: Visitor is a full-motion video (FMV) detective suspense game. The game tells a story that on a winter night in 2017, a murder case happened in a residential building, a prostitute Shasha died in her own home.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows XP+ 处理器: Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD Radeon HD 5750. OpenGL 3.3 DirectX 版本: 11 存储空间: 需要 3 GB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 7+ 处理器: Quad Core 2.3GHz or equivalent processor 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: Direct X 11.0 compliant video card with 2GB RAM (NVidia GeForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon HD 7850) 存储空间: 需要 3 GB 可用空间
